Arsenal players are playing combination football and attempting to create a goal scoring opportunity, but they will have to wait for that as they have just lost possession due to a poor pass.

Arsenal force a corner. Their opponents will face another attacking threat. The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Mesut Ozil (Arsenal). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Craig Pawson didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

Aaron Ramsey (Arsenal) produces a ferocious strike from the edge of the box. His dangerous effort towards the middle of the goal is blocked by Kasper Schmeichel, who pulls off a superb save to keep the ball out of the net.
